text.section:
The Board of Community College Trustees for Frederick County consists of seven members. Of the members:
Each shall be a resident of Frederick County; and
Each shall be appointed by the Governor, with the advice and consent of the Senate, for a term of 5 years.

section.section: A member of the Board of Community College Trustees may not serve more than three consecutive 5 year terms.
A member of the Frederick County Board of Education may not serve on the Board of Community College Trustees.

text.section: Each member of the Board is entitled to $500 a year for expenses.
